long_description: With a soft, warm interior and sleek, durable exterior, the REI Rauk jacket wicks moisture and breathes easily making it an ideal layer for active fun in crisp, chilly weather. 4-way stretch fabric offers a full range of motion and moves moisture away from the body where it evaporates quickly to keep you dry and comfortable. Durable exterior resists pilling while the brushed interior is soft next to skin and holds in warmth. Lightweight overlays at the shoulders and hips prevent abrasion without adding significant weight. Flatlock stitching eliminates chafing and enhances fit by reducing bulky seams. 2 zip hand pockets and zip sleeve pocket with media port. Hood includes a slim drawcord adjustment. Interior windflap; chin guard; drawcord hem; thumb loops. The REI Rauk jacket has a sleek, close-to-body fit.
short_description: With a soft, warm interior and sleek, durable exterior, the REI Rauk jacket wicks moisture and breathes easily making it an ideal layer for active fun in crisp, chilly weather.
